Control.name: func_en
Control.desc: func_en,RW,unsigned,1,0,ldc enable

Control.name: fw_sel
Control.desc: fw_sel,RW,unsigned,1,0,switch fw; use for custom fw, unsigned int0=aml_hw_fw; 1=aml_sw_fw

Control.name: ldc_hist_mode
Control.desc: ldc_hist_mode,RW,unsigned,3,3,the mode for hist statistic value to calculate initial backlight, 0:avg 1: max95, 2, max, 3:blend, 4: adaptive blend coef and blend target(max95 or max)

Control.name: ldc_hist_blend_mode
Control.desc: ldc_hist_blend_mode,RW,unsigned,1,1,the blend mode to calculate initial backlight when hist mode=3, 0: max + avg, 1:max95 + avg

Control.name: ldc_hist_blend_alpha
Control.desc: ldc_hist_blend_alpha,RW,unsigned,7,0x60,the coef for blend when hist mode=3, 128 means 1

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_max_gain
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_max_gain,RW,unsigned,4,13,the gain for blend max value when hist mode=4

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_diff_th1
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_diff_th1,RW,unsigned,12,256,the threshold between max95 and average when hist mode=4, default= 46

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_diff_th2
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_diff_th2,RW,unsigned,12,640,the threshold between max95 and average when hist mode=4, default= 106

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_th0
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_th0,RW,unsigned,6,2,the blend threshold base in curve when hist mode=4

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_thn
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_thn,RW,unsigned,4,4,the blend threshold increase step in curve when hist mode=4, th0+1thn

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_gain_0
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_gain_0,RW,unsigned,8,0x70,the blend gain0 in curve when hist mode=4

Control.name: ldc_hist_adap_blend_gain_1
Control.desc: ldc_hist_adap_blend_gain_1,RW,unsigned,8,0x40,the blend gain1 in curve when hist mode=4

Control.name: ldc_init_bl_min
Control.desc: ldc_init_bl_min,RW,unsigned,12,0,the minimum value of init_bl

Control.name: ldc_init_bl_max
Control.desc: ldc_init_bl_max,RW,unsigned,12,4095,the maximum value of init_bl

Control.name: ldc_dimming_curve_en
Control.desc: ldc_dimming_curve_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,bl remap dimming curve

Control.name: ldc_sf_mode
Control.desc: ldc_sf_mode,RW,unsigned,2,2,the mode for backlight spatial filter, 0: no filter, 1: TSF filter , 2: new spatial filter

Control.name: ldc_sf_gain_up
Control.desc: ldc_sf_gain_up,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the gain for backlight up

Control.name: ldc_sf_gain_dn
Control.desc: ldc_sf_gain_dn,RW,unsigned,8,0x0,the gain for backlight down,256 as 1

Control.name: ldc_sf_tsf_3x3
Control.desc: ldc_sf_tsf_3x3,RW,unsigned,12,0x600,smoothness control of the spatial filter at 3x3

Control.name: ldc_sf_tsf_5x5
Control.desc: ldc_sf_tsf_5x5,RW,unsigned,12,0xc00,smoothness control of the spatial filter at 5x5

Control.name: ldc_bs_bl_mode
Control.desc: ldc_bs_bl_mode,RW,unsigned,3,0,the boost mode, 0:no boost,1:glb boost,2:local boost,3:max,4:min,5:avg

Control.name: ldc_glb_apl
Control.desc: ldc_glb_apl,RO,unsigned,12,4095,global apl

Control.name: ldc_bs_glb_apl_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_glb_apl_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,0x10 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_dark_scene_bl_th
Control.desc: ldc_bs_dark_scene_bl_th,RW,unsigned,12,0x200,the global threshold for dark scene

Control.name: ldc_bs_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the boost gain, default=0x20, 256 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_limit_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_limit_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x60,the boost limit gain, 0x40 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_apl_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_apl_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the local apl gain for dark scene, 0x10 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_max_min_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_max_min_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the local boost gain,0x10 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_dark_scene_bl_th
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_dark_scene_bl_th,RW,unsigned,12,0x600,the local threshold for dark scene

Control.name: ldc_sc_hist_diff_th
Control.desc: ldc_sc_hist_diff_th,RW,unsigned,32,2764800,hist diff th for sc

Control.name: ldc_sc_apl_diff_th
Control.desc: ldc_sc_apl_diff_th,RW,unsigned,10,384,global apl diff th for sc

Control.name: ldc_tf_sc_flag
Control.desc: ldc_tf_sc_flag,RO,unsigned,1,0,the flag for scene change for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_en
Control.desc: ldc_tf_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,temporal filter enable

Control.name: ldc_tf_low_alpha
Control.desc: ldc_tf_low_alpha,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the low alpha for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_high_alpha
Control.desc: ldc_tf_high_alpha,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the high alpha for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_low_alpha_sc
Control.desc: ldc_tf_low_alpha_sc,RW,unsigned,8,0x40,the low alpha for temporal filter in scene change

Control.name: ldc_tf_high_alpha_sc
Control.desc: ldc_tf_high_alpha_sc,RW,unsigned,8,0x40,the high alpha for temporal filter in scene change

Control.name: compensation_en
Control.desc: remapping_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,ldc compensation enable

Control.name: ldc_glb_gain
Control.desc: ldc_glb_gain,RW,unsigned,12,0x380,the global coef for compensation gain

Control.name: ldc_dth_en
Control.desc: ldc_dth_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,the enable dither

Control.name: ldc_dth_bw
Control.desc: ldc_dth_bw,RW,unsigned,1,1,0: 2bits, 1: 4bits

Control.name: ldc_bl_buf_diff
Control.desc: ldc_bl_buf_diff,RW,unsigned,2,0,the compensation memory diff frame later than backlight

Control.name: BL_matrix:debug
Control.desc: 最终背光值输出

Control.desc: 强制输出指定灯区的亮度值

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_apl_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_apl_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the local apl gain for dark scene, 0x10 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_max_min_gain
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_max_min_gain,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the local boost gain,0x10 as 1

Control.name: ldc_bs_loc_dark_scene_bl_th
Control.desc: ldc_bs_loc_dark_scene_bl_th,RW,unsigned,12,0x600,the local threshold for dark scene

Control.name: ldc_sc_hist_diff_th
Control.desc: ldc_sc_hist_diff_th,RW,unsigned,32,2764800,hist diff th for sc

Control.name: ldc_sc_apl_diff_th
Control.desc: ldc_sc_apl_diff_th,RW,unsigned,10,384,global apl diff th for sc

Control.name: ldc_tf_sc_flag
Control.desc: ldc_tf_sc_flag,RO,unsigned,1,0,the flag for scene change for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_en
Control.desc: ldc_tf_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,temporal filter enable

Control.name: ldc_tf_low_alpha
Control.desc: ldc_tf_low_alpha,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the low alpha for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_high_alpha
Control.desc: ldc_tf_high_alpha,RW,unsigned,8,0x20,the high alpha for temporal filter

Control.name: ldc_tf_low_alpha_sc
Control.desc: ldc_tf_low_alpha_sc,RW,unsigned,8,0x40,the low alpha for temporal filter in scene change

Control.name: ldc_tf_high_alpha_sc
Control.desc: ldc_tf_high_alpha_sc,RW,unsigned,8,0x40,the high alpha for temporal filter in scene change

Control.name: compensation_en
Control.desc: remapping_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,ldc compensation enable

Control.name: ldc_glb_gain
Control.desc: ldc_glb_gain,RW,unsigned,12,0x380,the global coef for compensation gain

Control.name: ldc_dth_en
Control.desc: ldc_dth_en,RW,unsigned,1,1,the enable dither

Control.name: ldc_dth_bw
Control.desc: ldc_dth_bw,RW,unsigned,1,1,0: 2bits, 1: 4bits

Control.desc: ldc_bl_buf_diff,RW,unsigned,2,0,the compensation memory diff frame later than backlight
